title: Don't Play Ranked! DC issue where you can't reconnect!
body:
Hi Everyone,

Just had a (normal) match where I DC'ed, and got booted to regular client screen and couldn't reconnect into the match. (There was no "reconnect" button)
So far I've seen at least 2 other posts of people being DC'ed. 
I don't know if I was the only one that got disconnected from the match, or the whole match blew up. I have no idea if people will report me, since they don't know that I can't reconnect, but really wanted to.

My internet connection wasn't interrupted, so it wasn't that. I've experienced quite a few disconnects lately at all hours of the day while no one else was using the internet.

It would be really great if Riot would actually reply to this, or any of the other posts that cover the same issue so that we may actually know what the issue is.

Kind regards,
H33P

replies.body: My apologies. I didn't mean to imply that you wouldn't be able to find it on your own, merely to substantiate my initial claim of seeing other instances of this issue, and supply the respective posts to you for convenience.

No worries here. It may have felt like you were the only one affected, but if you never had the option to reconnect then everyone else would have been booted as well since the entire game crashed. Nobody will have gotten any penalties, so you're free to requeue without worry.

> No worries here. It may have felt like you were the only one affected, but if you never had the option to reconnect then everyone else would have been booted as well since the entire game crashed. Nobody will have gotten any penalties, so you're free to requeue without worry.

Thanks for the reply, but I've seen a few posts about the same issue (links below)
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/b0uWl2NK-cant-rejoin-game
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rdj2vIwm-no-reconnect-button-when-i-left-game-and-i-was-able-to-start-another
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/oAw6uJkg-cannot-rejoin-game-after-dc
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MjEHWZf9-everyone-in-game-couldnt-reconnect

As you may observe all these posts are very recent. Hence it might not be as much of an isolated incident as suggested.
Oooooh trust, I've been making my way downtown through the boards seeing these as well. I'm reaching out to a few people to see if I can get them to look a little closer at what might be going on.
